He's in panther mode, although he can fly alittle in bot mode. He's a 
deadly assasin as tough as Heero Yui so despite his cat instincts he 
can put up with a little water as he swims for the mainland.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., Legendarynemasis@a... wrote:
> OOC: Dewboy, how is Optimus Fury getting there? Does he fly? How 
does he fly? 
> What does he do?
> 
> IC: Under the ocean Optimus's fury ship is already nearly totally 
dismantled 
> as thousands of nano drones break it down outside the Oblivion. 
Already its 
> computer has been dismantled and its data downloaded.
